function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Deposition of virus on surfaces after contact with infected person or via turbulent flow","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and contamination of surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of surfaces, use of antiviral coatings, and proper ventilation systems","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection, antiviral surface coatings, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Building management and maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Forced confinement at home leading to increased risk of viral spread","Impact":"Higher risk of virus transmission within households and residential buildings","Mitigation":"Proper ventilation, use of air purifiers, and adherence to safety measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and smart building automation","People":"Residents, families, and visitors","Owner":"Homeowners, building management, and maintenance teams"},{"Description":"Closure of public spaces and suspension of activities","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for social distancing and increased risk of virus transmission in crowded spaces","Mitigation":"Improved remote working and learning options, utilization of digital technologies for virtual meetings and classes","Technologies":"Video conferencing tools, online learning platforms, and remote work software","People":"Public space visitors, employees, students, and event attendees","Owner":"Government agencies, educational institutions, and event organizers"}]}
